title: Universal Financial Access for the Poorest
description: In 2021, 100% of Austria's poorest 40% of the population aged 15 and above had an account at a financial institution or with a mobile-money-service provider.

title: Minimal Maternal Mortality
description: Austria had an exceptionally low maternal mortality ratio of 1 per 100,000 live births in 2017.

title: Efficient Logistics Performance
description: In 2022, Austria scored 4.3 out of 5 on the logistics performance index for timely shipments, indicating high efficiency.

title: Low Business Losses from Crime
description: In 2021, Austrian firms reported only 0.5% of annual sales lost due to theft and vandalism, one of the lowest rates globally.
